body_html:
The native OCR code that I work with runs painfully slow without compiler optimizations on arm64-v8a

Recognizing a default test image was taking ~19 sec on the arm64-v8a Nexus 5x, but only ~7 sec on the considerably weaker armeabi-v7a Moto E2.

As @bissacc0 said, be sure to use:

APP_OPTIM := release
APP_CFLAGS += -O3
LOCAL_LDFLAGS += -flto

In your make files. Using these flags reduced recognition time from 19 s to 4 s (!!!) on the Nexus 5x

body:
The native OCR code that I work with runs painfully slow without compiler optimizations on arm64-v8a

Recognizing a default test image was taking ~19 sec on the arm64-v8a Nexus 5x, but only ~7 sec on the considerably weaker armeabi-v7a Moto E2.

As @bissacc0 said, be sure to use:

APP_OPTIM := release
APP_CFLAGS += -O3
LOCAL_LDFLAGS += -flto

In your make files. Using these flags reduced recognition time from 19 s to 4 s (!!!) on the Nexus 5x
